(b) Local educational agency report Each local educational agency receiving funds under this part shall submit to the State educational agency such information as the State requires, which shall include the information described in subsection (a) for the local educational agency.
(c) Availability The reports and information provided under subsections (a) and (b) shall be made readily available to the public.
(d) Limitation The reports and information provided under subsections (a) and (b) shall not reveal personally identifiable information about any individual.
